build.script:
#!/bin/sh
rm -rf pipelinec_output_uxn.c_1
sleep 1
rm lextab.py
rm yacctab.py
rm work-obj08.cf
sleep 1
docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/workdir pipelinec uxn.c

clean.script:
#!/bin/sh
rm -rf pipelinec_output_uxn.c_1
sleep 1
rm lextab.py
rm yacctab.py
rm work-obj08.cf
sleep 1

run.script:
rm -rf pipelinec_output_uxn.c_1
sleep 1
rm lextab.py
rm yacctab.py
rm work-obj08.cf
sleep 1
docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/workdir pipelinec uxn.c --sim --comb --ghdl
sleep 1
sed -i '' 's/\/workdir\///g' ./pipelinec_output_uxn.c_1/vhdl_files.txt
ghdl -i --std=08 --work=work $(cat ./pipelinec_output_uxn.c_1/vhdl_files.txt) top_test.vhd
ghdl -m --std=08 --work=work top_test
ghdl -r --std=08 --work=work top_test --ieee-asserts=disable --stop-time=120ms
